traits.name: Dancing Stars
traits.desc: Brilliant lights dance around the starcaller, exuding bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

traits.name: Retaliating Energies
traits.desc: Whenever an enemy within 200 ft. hits the starcaller with a ranged attack, one of the stars dancing around it launches at the attacker, dealing 7 (2d4 + 2) radiant damage.

traits.name: Radiant Armor
traits.desc: While the starcaller is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC incluces its Intelligence modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The starcaller makes three attacks with its radiant palm or two attacks with its shooting star.

actions.name: Radiant Palm
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Shooting Star
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Starfall (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The starcaller summons a brilliant orb of radiant energy at a point in the sky within 150-feet, then brings it crashing into the ground in a 20-foot radius area. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that fail this save by 5 or more are also blinded until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Step Through The Stars (3/Day)
actions.desc: The starcaller vanishes in a brilliant flash of light and reappears with an equally bright flash in an unoccupied space within 200 ft. Each creature within 10-feet of where the starcaller began or ended must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of their next turn. After teleporting, the starcaller may make a single attack with radiant palm or shooting star.
